Uses of Class
uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees.TreeNode

Packages that use TreeNode
uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees Provides basic binary tree implementations that are used during indexing of documents. 
 

Uses of TreeNode in uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees
 

Subclasses of TreeNode in uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees
 class BlockFieldDocumentTreeNode
          Models the tree node used when building the direct index with block and field information.
 class BlockLexiconTreeNode
          The tree node used when building a lexicon with block information.
 class ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
          This class implements the node of a comparable term in the document tree of comparable terms Used by the class ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTree
 class DICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
          This class represents a node in the DICOMFieldDocumentTree and contains the term.
 class FieldDocumentTreeNode
          The tree node used by the class FieldDocumentTree, when building the direct file with field information.
 class TermTreeNode
          This class represents a node in the binary tree of a query.
